meanings.definition: A substance that is injected into the body.
meanings.sent1: The nurse prepared the injectants before giving the patient a shot.
meanings.sent2: Doctors use injectants to deliver medicine directly into the bloodstream.
meanings.sent3: The injectants seemed to have a mind of their own, jumping into the syringe.
meanings.sent4: Her words were like injectants, spreading quickly through the conversation.
meanings.sent5: The injectants glowed brightly under the fluorescent lights of the hospital.

meanings.definition: The act of injecting a substance into something.
meanings.sent1: The injectants into the cake batter made it rise perfectly.
meanings.sent2: The injectants of dye into the fabric created a beautiful pattern.
meanings.sent3: The chef's injectants of flavor into the dish were a secret ingredient.
meanings.sent4: His music was an injectants of emotion into the hearts of the audience.
meanings.sent5: The injectants of creativity into the project transformed it into a masterpiece.
